item.title: Will Wasabi Survive The Night?
item.description: Follow Wasabi the bear as he navigates the challenges of the wilderness after sunset, offering a glimpse into the resilience and instincts of wildlife.

media:content.media:title: Will Wasabi Survive The Night?
media:content.media:description: Follow Wasabi the bear as he navigates the challenges of the wilderness after sunset, offering a glimpse into the resilience and instincts of wildlife.

item.title: Would Ted Like Any Of These Amazing Modern Cars?
item.description: Explore a range of modern cars, from electric to sleek designs, and imagine which one might catch Ted’s eye.

item.title: There's A Repo Order For A Honda Odyssey Van!
item.description: See what happens when a Honda Odyssey is scheduled for repossession and the steps involved in the process.

item.title: One Tiny Bear, One Huge Comeback!
item.description: Follow the inspiring journey of a small bear as it overcomes challenges and thrives in the wild.

item.title: Rare BMW 325i at Stake!
item.description: Check out this rare BMW 325i as it takes center stage, drawing attention from car enthusiasts everywhere.

item.title: This Is The Wreck Of The Ship Tabarka From WWII!
item.description: Explore the underwater remains of the Tabarka, a World War II shipwreck, offering a glimpse into maritime history and naval heritage.

item.title: They Have To Take A Helicopter!
item.description: A challenging job requires the team to rely on a helicopter, demonstrating resourcefulness and careful planning to complete the task.

item.title: There Are 16 Bears In The Shelter!
item.description: A wildlife shelter cares for 16 rescued bears, providing a safe environment and highlighting efforts in animal rescue and conservation.

item.title: He Worked All Night To Finish The F-100!
item.description: A dedicated mechanic puts in hours through the night to complete restoration on a classic F-100 truck.

item.title: No Jade? Nightmare Drill Day!
item.description: Miners face a challenging day when no jade is found, highlighting the patience and perseverance required in the trade.

item.title: This Is Just An Extra Step He Has To Do!
item.description: A worker takes on one more task to ensure the project is done right, showing attention to detail and dedication on the job.

item.title: Let’s See What He’ll Pay for This Bel Air!
item.description: A classic Bel Air hits the spotlight as negotiations begin — will the offer match this vintage beauty’s true value?

item.title: This Jade Might Be The One!
item.description: A miner discovers a promising piece of jade, highlighting the excitement and careful evaluation in the search for high-quality gems.

item.title: One Mistake Can Ruin This Truck!
item.description: A delicate operation shows how careful handling is crucial to protect a valuable truck during jade transport.

item.title: They Found Papers Of A Pilot From The WWI!
item.description: Historic documents from a World War I pilot resurface, offering a rare glimpse into aviation’s earliest days and the lives of those who first took to the skies.

item.title: Will He Convince Him To Sell This Car!
item.description: A rare classic sparks tough negotiations as one buyer tries to seal the deal — will passion or price win this round?

item.title: She Won't Give His Son The Full Price?!
item.description: This is a critical warning for car owners. We’ll show you how a small coolant leak quickly led to a catastrophic engine failure and the difficult steps needed to fix the damage.

item.title: Unexpected Encounter! They Were Nervous To Meet Them!
item.description: A nerve-wracking meeting unfolds as riders come face-to-face with the Hells Angels, highlighting respect and caution on the road.

item.title: They Have To Take The Helicopter!
item.description: When a unique situation arises, the team relies on a helicopter to complete their task safely and efficiently.

item.title: The Truck Has Issues, It Can't Stop!
item.description: A truck experiences mechanical issues, creating a challenging situation for the team as they work to regain control safely.
